name: 汤姆·鲍尔勒
introduction: A 40 year broadcaster and perennially recognized by the talk radio industry trade site "Talkers," as one of the top 100 Radio Talk Show Hosts in America, Tom also plays guitar with numerous bands in the Buffalo, NY area, and is a member of SAG. In August and September 2021, To was cast in a number of uncredited roles in the now-untitled "Cabrini" film being shot in Buffalo, NY, in which he primarily portrays a wealthy American, bartender and construction worker.
